meanings.definition: The study of ancient life forms through fossils.
meanings.sent1: In paleobiology, scientists examine fossils to learn about creatures from long ago.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use paleobiology to understand how animals lived in the past.
meanings.sent3: The paleobiology class had a fun field trip to dig for ancient fossils.
meanings.sent4: Exploring paleobiology is like solving a puzzle of the past using fossil pieces.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit on paleobiology brought ancient creatures back to life through fossils.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of prehistoric life.
meanings.sent1: Studying paleobiology helps us understand life on Earth long before humans.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use paleobiology to uncover secrets of ancient organisms.
meanings.sent3: The paleobiology lab was filled with excitement as they discovered a new fossil.
meanings.sent4: Paleobiology is like a time machine taking us back to the era of dinosaurs.
meanings.sent5: The book on paleobiology painted a vivid picture of prehistoric creatures through fossils.

meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with the study of ancient organisms.
meanings.sent1: Paleobiology focuses on understanding how ancient organisms evolved over time.
meanings.sent2: Biologists specializing in paleobiology study the development of life forms from the past.
meanings.sent3: The paleobiology conference brought together experts to discuss ancient species.
meanings.sent4: In the world of paleobiology, each fossil tells a unique story of ancient life.
meanings.sent5: The documentary on paleobiology showcased the diversity of ancient organisms through fossils.
